name: Apart (I_make_games_ig)
description:
Controls: Left + Right arrow keys to move Left + Right(shocking)(Not clickbait) Space Bar to Jump. R to restart Level

One day there was monkey and then monkey decided to become human. This was monkey's worst decision. Years of human evolution later Human decided to return to monkey and reject society. But the One genius said"what if we return further back than monkey" so then they did. They became squares. They must shed apart thier differences and come together lest they shall remain apart forever. This game is a commentary on society and how even though we are all different, if we all put effort in and come together, we can do anything. Including making two squares touch .
